sentences.en: carriers of the lung disease, TB
Deliveries are made by common carrier or van line.
sentences.cn: 货物运输采用普通货车或厢式货车。

sentences.en: He became a hod carrier on a building site.
sentences.cn: 他在建筑工地上当起了小工。

sentences.en: He had returned to England in an aircraft carrier no less.
sentences.cn: 他竟然坐航空母舰回的英格兰。

sentences.en: He stooped to pick up the carrier bag of groceries.
sentences.cn: 他俯下身去提装着食品杂货的购物袋。

sentences.en: He was accused of acting as a carrier for drug pushers.
sentences.cn: 他被指控为一些毒贩运毒。

sentences.en: I emptied the contents of the fridge into carrier bags.
sentences.cn: 我把冰箱里的东西全都腾到手提袋里。

sentences.en: Keeping carrier pigeons is his hobby.
sentences.cn: 养信鸽是他的业余爱好.

sentences.en: Switzerland's national carrier, Swissair, has been having a hard time recently.
sentences.cn: 瑞士的国有航空公司——瑞士航空公司，最近日子很不好过。

sentences.en: The aircraft carrier has been docked there since last month.
sentences.cn: 自上个月以来那艘航空母舰就一直停靠在那儿。

sentences.en: The airplane lifted from the aircraft carrier.
sentences.cn: 飞机从航空母舰上起飞.

sentences.en: The carrier wave has got out of phase with the signal wave.
sentences.cn: 载波同信号波是异相的.

sentences.en: The haulage company was a carrier of machine parts to Turkey.
sentences.cn: 该公路货运公司负责将机械零件运往土耳其。

sentences.en: The planes bam med against the deck of the aircraft carrier.
sentences.cn: 飞机砰砰地冲撞航空母舰的甲板.

sentences.en: The virus mutates in the carrier's body.
sentences.cn: 病毒会在携带者体内发生变异。

words.tran_cn: 驾运货马车；用运货车运送
运货人,运货公司,传信人

phrases.tran_cn: 航空运输；航空公司；航线；空运机
n. 航空母舰；全能篮球中锋
童车；婴儿背带；轻型航空母舰
公共承运人；公用运输业者

trans.tran_cn: 运输工具，搬运人，军车，运输舰，航空母舰，运输公司，携带病菌者，载物架，通信公司，互联网公司
trans.tran_en: someone who passes a disease or  gene  to other people, especially without being affected by it themselves
